entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR C++ breaks after writing this #44035
  • What is the difference between AddHttpClientInstrumentation and AddAspNetCoreInstrumentation #44033
  • DefaultHtmlGenerator could add min and max HTML attributes based on RangeAttribute #44031
  • Schema change limits aspnetcore session state in SQL #44028
  • Provide HttpContext to baseUriTaskFactory in UseProxyToSpaDevelopmentServer #44025
  • Blazor WASM PWA's service worker causes issue with OpenID Connect #44023

Closed

  • Hosting Multiple (React) SPAs in Asp.Net Core for development. #31229
    Backlog
  • Add WebApplicationBuilderSettingInvalidApplicationWillFailAssemblyLoadForUserSecrets back #44016
  • [Epic]: Implement Rate Limiting Middleware in aspnetcore #37384
    7.0.0
  • Perf improvement: json #44024
  • "IISExpress LaunchUrl" is not working #43886
  • Using an out parameter in a controller leads to Could not load type 'System.Char&' from assembly 'System.Private.CoreLib, Version=7.0.0.0 ...' #43256
    7.0-rc2
  • Using the System.Text.Json source generator with ASP NET Core throws NotSupportedException when attempting to serialize IEnumerable<T> #43894
    7.0-rc2
  • Debug blazor server/wasm #43989

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44034
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Get template error codes from the right processes #44032
    area-mvc, feature-templates, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44022
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update versions for 7.0.0 RTM #43992
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.0
  • Only add MethodInfo to route handler endpoints #44021
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Fix URL building for SPA proxying #43407
    area-mvc, feature-spa, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Adding WebApplicationBuilderSettingInvalidApplicationDoesNotThrowWhen… #44030
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Remove unneeded generic params from test case #44011
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Quarantine ClosingTheBrowserWindow_GracefullyDisconnects_TheCurrentCi… #44018
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/3.1] Stop building on Ubuntu 18.04 #43666
    area-infrastructure
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1995899 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Triggering IConnectionLifetimeNotificationFeature on GoAway #43431
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Remove attributes from SVG elements #43957
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Allow zero byte reads on the test server response body #44020
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 6.0.x
